brainly_data.question:
The invention pictured in this image helped to revolutionize the field of 
A) astronomy 
B) agriculture
C) heliocentric model 
D) astrology
brainly_data.subject: History

all_answers.question:
The invention pictured in this image helped to revolutionize the field of 
A) astronomy 
B) agriculture
C) heliocentric model 
D) astrology
all_answers.subject: History
all_answers.text: What is pictured in the image is an early telescope. So, since a telescope is used to look at things far away in the sky, such as stars or planets, it would have been used to further astronomy.
